description: Describes the title, description of the Composite Swagger. It provides a mechanism to bind/package clients generated from multiple swaggers together into one composite client.
title: A JSON Schema for Composite Swagger in Swagger 2.0 API.

$eref.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

___name.description: The name of the license type. It's encouraged to use an OSI compatible license.

___url.description: The URL pointing to the license.

vendorExtension.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

$eref.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

contact.description: Contact information for the owners of the API.

___name.description: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

___email.description: The email address of the contact person/organization.

___url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information.

___documents.description: Describes the list of relative or absolute swagger document urls or file paths.

items.description: A relative or absolute url or file path to a swagger document to be included in the list.

___description.description: A longer description of the API. Should be different from the title. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

___termsOfService.description: The terms of service for the API.

___title.description: A unique and precise title of the API.

$eref.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

___description.description: A longer description of the API. Should be different from the title. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

___termsOfService.description: The terms of service for the API.

___url.description: The URL pointing to the license.

___title.description: A unique and precise title of the API.
